definition[0]: someone who uses every opportunity to gain power, money, or unfair advantages – used to show disapproval
example[0]: Voters dislike opportunists – politicians who change their policies according to opinion polls.
definition[1]: someone who commits a crime because they have a chance to, and not because they planned to
definition[2]: a person or organization that is willing to use every chance to gain an advantage or make money
example[3]: These companies represent a growing band of economic opportunists - they move with lightning speed whenever an opportunity opens.
